name: Easter 2022
description:
Figure 1

Easter 2022

Welcome to Easter 2022!

 The aim of this short game is to find all of the eggs as fast as possible.

There is currently only one area to explore but hopefully, more will soon follow. Controls:

  • Pressing "Esc" will free your cursor and to lock it in again, press "F11" and click the screen.
  • Pressing "M" whilst trying to find the eggs will stop the music.
  • Pressing the R button as shown in Figure 1 will result in you losing your time so don't do this lightly, the times are stored on your device so if you decide to delete the game then reinstall, your times will be there. Or if I add new maps, they will stay.
  • Use "W", "A", "S" and "D" with the mouse to control you character
  • You can press "Left shift" to sprint

Good luck!
